code: import debug from"debug";import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{Player as PlayerView}from"./Player";import{player}from"../../Player";var log=debug("atpls:player");export var Player=function Player(props){useEffect(function(){return addKeyboardListeners();});return React.createElement(PlayerView,props);};function addKeyboardListeners(){log("Installing keyboard");var keyboard=player.control.keyboard;var onKeyDown=function onKeyDown(event){return keyboard.keyDown(event.key);};var onKeyUp=function onKeyUp(event){return keyboard.keyUp(event.key);};window.addEventListener("keydown",onKeyDown);window.addEventListener("keyup",onKeyUp);return function(){log("Dispose keyboard");window.removeEventListener("keydown",onKeyDown);window.removeEventListener("keyup",onKeyUp);};}
